Paragraph.Text: RWY 09L/27R CLSD.

CHANGE TO AIP SUP IFR 17/24. INCORRECT LDA RWY 09L (1320M) PUBLISHED. CORRECT LDA RWY 09L 3200M. ALL ACFT LANDING AT RWY 09L AND UNABLE TO EXIT VIA TWY L EXP BACKTRACK OR TOWING PROC AT THR 27R. LANDING DISTANCE BTN THR RWY 09L AND TWY L 1700M.

AFTER PASSING 2000 BRNAV EQPT NECESSARY. REF AD 2 EDDV 5-7-15, 5-7-17 BOTH EFF 07 SEP 2023.

RNP APCH RWY 27L, AMEND TABULAR DESCRIPTION FM IAF NIE ALT AT DV600 TO READ AT OR ABOVE 4000. ALT AT ODINI AT OR ABOVE 3000. CHG PERM. REF AD 2 EDDV 4-6-2 EFF 23 MAY 2019. RNP APCH RWY 27R, AMEND TABULAR DESCRIPTION FM IAF NIE ALT AT DV610 TO READ AT OR ABOVE 4000. ALT AT XAVER AT OR ABOVE 3000. CHG PERM. REF AD 2 EDDV 4-6-4 EFF 23 MAY 2019.

SX0017/24 AIP SUPPLEMENT EDDV/HANNOVER VALIDITY: 26APR24 - 19JUL24 CONSTRUCTION WORK AT HANNOVER AIRPORT (2 PHASES) IN UNFAVOURABLE MET CON (DRY AND WINDY), THE LARGE-SCALE CONSTRUCTION WORK MAY CAUSE VIS ACCUMULATIONS OF DUST. DURING THE ENTIRE CONSTRUCTION MEASURE, A PROVISIONAL ACCESS TAXILANE WILL BE ESTABLISHED TO CONNECT APRON GA3. ALL ACFT FROM AND TO APRON GA3 MAY BE TOWED ONLY FROM TWY M WHERE IT MEETS THE PROVISIONAL ACCESS TAXILANE. ADDITINAL RESTRICTIONS BY NTM. ***PHASE 1: 26APR24 - 24MAY24*** THE FOLLOWING FACILITIES IN THE AREA OF THE NORTHERN OPERATING AREAS WILL BE CLSD: RWY 09L/27R, TWY G, TWY H, TWY J, TWY K, TWY KTO, TWY L BTN RWY 09C/27C AND RWY 09L/27R, TWY M BTN THE PROVISIONAL ACCESS TAXILANE TO GA3 AND RWY 09L/27R, TWY N, TWY Q (CONNECTION TO APRON GA3 VIA PROVISIONAL ACCESS TAXILANE), EXTENDED TAKE-OFF RUN RWY 09L/27R *THE NOISE SUPPRESSION FACILITY WILL BE CLSD DURING THE CONSTRUCTION WORK IN PHASE 1. DURING THIS TIME, ENGINE TEST RUNS MAY BE CONDUCTED BTN THE APRON AND TAXIWAY INTERSECTION M/F ***PHASE 2: 24MAY24 - 19JUL24*** THE FOLLOWING FACILITIES IN THE AREA OF THE NORTHERN OPERATING AREAS WILL BE CLSD OR RESTRICTED: TWY M BTN THE PROVISIONAL ACCESS TAXILANE TO GA3 AND RWY 09L/27R, TWY N, TWY Q (CONNECTION TO APRON GA3 VIA PROVISIONAL ACCESS ROAD), EXTENDED TAKE-OFF RUN RWY 27R *RESTRICTIONS OF RWY 09L/27R: TAKE-OFFS FROM RWY 27R REQUIRING A TORA OF MORE THAN 1900 M ARE ONLY POSSIBLE WITH A BACKTRACK PROCEDURE. A YELLOW TAXI GUIDE LINE IN THE AREA OF THRESHOLD 27R CAN BE USED TO GUIDE ACFT THROUGH THE BACKTRACK PROCEDURE. THE BACKTRACK PROCEDURE APPLIES TO ALL ACFT INCLUDING THOSE OF EASA CODE D. AT NIGHT, IN BAD VIS OR IF REQ BY THE PILOT, GUIDANCE BY A FOLLOW-ME VEHICLE FOR THE PROCEDURE SHALL BE REQUESTED FROM HANNOVER GROUND 121.950 MHZ PRIOR TO THE TAXI PROCESS. FOR AIRCRAFT OF EASA CODE E, IT IS POSS TO USE THE FULL TORA OF 3200 M BY MEANS OF A TOWING PROCEDURE STARTING AT THRESHOLD 27R. GUIDANCE WILL BE PROVIDED BY A FOLLOW-ME VEHICLE TO BE REQUESTED VIA HANNOVER GROUND 121.950 MHZ. THIS TOWING PROCEDURE CAN CAUSE A DELAY OF UP TO 30 MINUTES AND, IN THE CASE OF A TAKE-OFF FROM RWY 27R, SHALL BE REQUESTED FROM THE AIRPORT DUTY OFFICER NO LATER THAN 45 MINUTES PRIOR TO THE PLANNED OFFBLOCK TIME. IN THE CASE OF LANDINGS ON RWY 09L REQUIRING AN LDA OF MORE THAN 3200M, A BACKTRACK OR TOWING PROCEDURE SHALL ALSO BE CONDUCTED STARTING AT THRESHOLD 27R BASED ON THE PROCEDURES FOR TAKE-OFFS FROM RWY 27R. ALL ACFT LANDING AT RWY 09L AND UNABLE TO EXIT VIA TWY L EXP BACKTRACK OR TOWING PROC AT THR 27R. LANDING DISTANCE BTN THR RWY 09L AND TWY L 1700M.
ILS RWY 27R U/S.
HANNOVER DME HAD CH86Y (113.95MHZ) U/S.

ILS RWY 09L U/S.

#0018/24 CHART NOTAMN Q) EDDV/QFACX/LBT A) EDDV B) 2404260000 C) UFN E) AOI, AGC WIP: REF AIP SUP 17/24 IN UNFAVOURABLE WX COND (DRY AND WIND) EXPECT DUST. PROVISINAL ACCESS TAXILINE WILL BE ESTABLISED TO CONNCECT APN GA3. ALL ACFT FROM AND TO APN GA3 MAY BE TOWED ONLY FROM TWY M WHERE IT MEETS THE PROVISINAL ACCESS TAXILINE. PHASE 1: 26 APR - 24 MAY 2024 THE FOLLOWING AREAS WILL BE CLSD: - RWY 09L/27R - RWY 09C/27C - TWY G, H, J, K, KTO, N - TWY L BTN RWY 09C/27C AND RWY 09L/27R - TWY M BTN PROVISIONAL ACCESS TAXILINE TO GA3 AND RWY 09L/27R - TWY Q (CONNECTION TO APN GA3 VIA PROVISIONAL ACCESS TAXILINE) - EXTENDED TKOF RUN RWY 09L/27R NOISE SUPPRESSION FACILITY WILL BE CLSD DURING WIP PHASE 1. ENGINE TEST RUNS MAY BE CONDUCTED BTN APN AND TWY INT M/F. PHASE 2: 24 MAY - 19 JUL 2024 THE FOLLOWING AREAS WILL BE CLSD: - RWY 09C/27C - ONLY AVBL FOR TKOF IN OPERATING DIRECTION 27 - TWY M BTN PROVISIONAL ACCESS TAXILINE TO GA3 AND RWY 09L/27R - TWY N - TWY Q (CONNECTION TO APN GA3 VIA PROVISIONAL ACCESS ROAD) - EXTENDED TKOF RUN RWY 27R RESTRITIONS OF RWY 09L/27R: TKOFS FROM TWY 27R REQUIRING TORA OF MORE THEN 1900M (6234FT) ARE ONLY POSSIBLE WITH BACKTRACK PROC. YELLOW TAXI GUIDE LINE IN THE AREA OF THR RWY 27R CAN BE ISED TO GUIDE ACFT THROUGH THE BACKTRACK PROC. THE BACKTRACK PROC APPLIES TO ALL ACFT INCLUDING CODE LETTER D. AT NIGHT, IN BAD VIS OR IF REQUIRED BY PILOT, GUIDANCE BY FOLLOW-ME SHALL BE REQUESTED FROM HANNOVER GND 121.950 PRIOR TO TAXI PROCESS. FOR CODE LETTER E ACFT IT IS POSSIBLE TO USE FULL TORA OF 3200M (10499FT) BY MEANS OF TOWING PROC STARTING AT THR RWY 27R. GUIDANCE WILL BE PROVIDED BY FOLLOW-ME REQUESTED VIA HANNOVER GND 121.950. TOWING PROC CAN CAUSE DELEY UP TO 30 MIN AND IN CASE OF TKOF FROM RWY 27R SHALL BE REQUESTED FROM APT DUTY OFFICER NO LATER THAN 45 MIN PRIOR TO PLANNED OFFBLOCK TIME. IN CASE OF LDGS ON RWY 09L REQUIRING LDA OF MORE THAN 1320M (4331FT) A BACKTRACK OR TOWING PROC SHALL BE CONDUCTED STARTING AT THR RWY 27R BASED ON PROC FOR TKOF FROM RWY 27R. FURTHER OPS RESTRICTIONS WILL BE PUBLISH VIA NOTAM.

#0010/24 CHART NOTAMR #0004/24 Q) EDDC/QFACX/LBT A) EDDC B) 2401040000 C) UFN E) AOI NIGHT RESTRICTIONS: AMEND WHOLE TEXT TO READ: NIGHT RESTRICTIONS: NO TKOF/LDG 2230-0430++ FOR SKED AND NON SKED COMMERCIAL FLIGHTS. EXCEPTIONS: - LDG FOR METEROLOGICAL, TECHNICAL OR OTHER SAFETY REASONS; - DELAYED TKOF/LDG 2230-2300++, IF SKED TKOF/LDG IS BEFORE 2230++; - PREMATURE LDG 0400-0430++, IF SKED LDG IS AFTER 0430++.

TWY C CLSD.
#0009/24 CHART NOTAMR #0008/24 Q) EDDE/QFACX/LBT A) EDDE B) 2405160000 C) 2405172359 E) * RWY DESIGNATOR: RWY IDENT AND RWY THR TO READ RWY 10 WITH THE ELEV 1025FT RWY 28 WITH THR ELEV 1016FT

AX0001/24 AIC RESTRICTION EDDB/BERLIN/BRANDENBURG VALIDITY: 25JAN24-UFN HANDLING OF ARR AND DEP AT EDDB 1.1 ASSIGNMENT OF THE TKOF RWY: THE ASSIGNMENT OF THE RWY FOR TKOF IS BASED ON THE FLW CONSIDERATIONS: -DEP FM THE ACFT STANDS ON APN 1, 2, 2A, 3, 3A, 3B, 4, A AND E AND THE ACFT STANDS B01 TO B04 AND D01 TO D07 WILL ALWAYS BE ASSIGNED RUNWAY 07L/25R. -ALL OTHER DEP WILL ALWAYS BE ASSIGNED RWY 07R/25L. 1.2 USE OF DEP RTE: FOR TKOF FM RWY 07L AND 07R, CIRCUMSTANCES REQUIRE AN INCREASED CLIMB GRADIENT (PROC DESIGN GRADIENT, PDG) TO BE MNTN ON THE NOISE-OPTIMISED DEP RTE. DUE TO THE HIGH NOISE SENSITIVITY, ALL FLT THAT CAN COMPLY WITH THESE GRADIENTS MUST, PLAN THE FLW DEP RTE: -DEP FM RWY 07L ON DEP RTE IN THE DIRECTION OF SUKIP OR LOGDO WILL USE RTE WITH THE ID B. -DEP FM RWY 07R ON DEP RTE IN THE DIRECTION OF SUKIP OR LOGDO WILL USE RTE WITH THE ID Q. CK PRIOR DEP NECESSARILY THE COMPLIANCE WITH THE RESTRICTION AT POBAM (F100+). IF UNA ADZ ATC PRIOR DEP IN DUE TIME. -DEP FM RWY 07R ON DEP RTE IN THE DIRECTION OF GERGA, ARSAP OR LUROS WILL USE RTE WITH THE ID Q. IF, FOR AERODYNAMIC OR MET REASONS, AN ACFT PILOT IS UNA TO FULFIL THE CLIMB GRADIENT SPECIFIED IN THE DEP RTE, THIS SHALL BE COMMUNICATED AT THE START-UP APPROVAL. ONLY IN SUCH CASES DFS WILL THEN GIVE THE CLR FOR THE ALTERNATIVE DEP RTE. 1.3 INDEPENDENT DEP OPS USUALLY, TKOF FM BOTH PARL RWY TAKE PLACE INDEPENDENTLY OF EACH OTHER. CARE MUST BE TAKEN TO COMPLY WITH THE PROC EXACTLY. ANY DEVIATIONS, ESPECIALLY IN THE DIRECTION OF THE PARL RWY, MUST BE AVOIDED AT ALL COSTS. THIS ALSO APPLIES TO DEVIATIONS DUE TO MET REASONS, WHICH MAY ONLY TAKE PLACE AFT CONSULTATION WITH ATC. 2.1 ASSIGNMENT OF LDG RWY: THE ASSIGNMENT OF THE RWY FOR THE APCH IS BASED ON THE FLW CONSIDERATIONS: APCH FM THE ACFT STANDS ON APN 1, 2, 2A, 3, 3A, 3B,4, A AND E AND THE ACFT STANDS B01 TO B04 AND D01 TO D07 WILL ALWAYS BE ASSIGNED RUNWAY 07L/25R. ALL OTHER APCH WILL ALWAYS BE ASSIGNED RWY 07R/25L. DEPENDING ON THE TFC SITUATION, DEVIATIONS FM THIS DISTRIBUTIONARE POSS, ESPECIALLY IN TERMS OF LOAD BALANCING. 2.2 CHANGING FREQ TO BERLIN DIRECTOR: WHEN CHANGING FREQUENCIES FM BREMEN RADAR TO BERLIN DIRECTOR, THE INITIAL CALL SHALL BE RESTRICTED TO THE CALL SIGN TO AVOID FREQ CONGESTION. 2.3 INDEPENDENT APCH OPS AS A RULE, APCH WILL BE PERFORMED IN INDEPENDENT PARL APCH OPS. THIS WILL BE ANNOUNCED THRU THE ATIS ON THE FREQ 123.780 MHZ.
TWY L5 CLSD BTN RWY 07L/25R AND TWY D.

ADS-B DATA FOR ECRA (EUROPEAN CONNECTED REGIONAL AIRPORTS PROGRAMME) OPERATIONS. 1.1.IN ORDER TO COOPERATE WITH ADS-B RECEIVER USED BY AIRPORT OPERATOR AND EUROCONTROL FOR USE OF THE ECRA PROGRAMME AT EINDHOVEN AIRPORT,PILOTS OF MODE S EQUIPPED ACFT WITH ADS-B FUNCTIONALITIES WHEN OPERATING ON THE GROUND SHALL: A)SELECT AUTO MODE AND THE ASSIGNED MODE A CODE OR B)IF AUTOMODE IS NOT AVAILABLE, SELECT ON (E.G.XPDR) AND THE ASSIGNED MODE A CODE. -FROM THE REQUEST FOR TOWER PUSH-BACK OR TAXI,WHICHEVER IS EARLIER -AFTER LANDING,CONTINUOUSLY UNTIL THE ACFT IS FULLY PARKED IN ITS STAND. -WHEN THE ACFT IS FULLY PARKED, FLT CREW SHALL SELECT STBY. 1.1.2.WHENEVER THE ACFT IS CAPABLE OF REPORTING ACFT IDENTIFICATION (I.E.CALLSIGN USED IN FLT), THIS SHOULD BE ENTERED (THROUGH THE FMS OR THE TRANSPONDER CONTROL PANEL) AT THE TIME OF THE REQUEST FOR TOWED PUSH-BACK OR TAXI, WHICHEVER IS EARLIER. 1.1.3.AIR CREW MUST USE THE ICAO DEFINED FORMAT TO ENTER THE ACFT IDENTIFICATION. 1.1.4.TO ENSURE THAT THE PERFORMANCE OF SYSTEMS BASED ON SSR FREQ (INCLUDING AIRBORNE TCAS AND SSR RADARS) IS NOT COMPROMISED, TCAS SHOULD NOT BE SELECTED BEFORE RECEIVING CLEARANCE TO LINE UP, AND SHOULD BE DESELECTED AFTER VACATING THE RWY.

MILITARY INVASION OF UKRAINE BY RUSSIAN FEDERATION. REROUTINGS, EXTENDED ROUTE PORTIONS BELOW FL245 AND DELAY MAY BE EXPECTED WITHIN LOWER AND UPPER GERMAN AIRSPACE DUE TO AIRSPACE RESTRICTIONS FOR THE EXECUTION OF MILITARY MISSIONS. IT IS RECOMMENDED TO CONSIDER THE USE OF EXTRA-FUEL.

KARLSRUHE UAC USES THE EUROCONTROL LOGON LIST TO STABILIZE CPDLC PERFORMANCE. ALL LOGON LISTED ACFT SHALL LOG ON TO KARLSRUHE UAC. DATA LINK ADDRESS OF KARLSRUHE UAC IS EDUU. NOT LOGON LISTED ACFT SHALL NOT TRY TO LOGON TO EDUU. LOGON FORWARDING FOR NOT LOGON LISTED ACFT WILL NOT BE PERFORMED. ALL OPERATORS ARE INVITED TO APPLY FOR LOGON LIST ENTRY VIA THE PUBLISHED EUROCONTROL PROCESS (AIP GERMANY PAGES GEN 3.4-70 THRU GEN 3.4-74 REFER).
GPS UNRELIABLE AND MAY BE NOT AVBL IN EASTERN PART OF FIR EDWW.
BUECKEBURG NDB BYC 368KHZ U/S DUE TO MISSING TECHNICAL MAINTENANCE

SX0029/20 AIP SUPPLEMENT EDVV/HANNOVER UIR, EDUU/RHEIN UIR VALIDITY: 06OCT22 - 30SEP27 FLIGHT OPERATIONS WITH MILITARY UAS RESTRICTED AREA: ED-R GH 470FL/660FL (CORRIDOR) IN THE ABOVE-MENTIONED AREA, ALL FLIGHTS EXCEPT FOR UNMANNED MILITARY FLIGHTS MAY ONLY BE CONDUCTED WITH A CLEARANCE FROM THE COMPETENT AIR TRAFFIC CONTROL UNIT. REQUESTS TO CROSS THE AREA CAN BE MADE VIA RADIOTELEPHONY. ED-D GH SEGMENT C 470FL/660FL ED-D GH SEGMENT N 470FL/660FL ALL PILOTS ARE URGENTLY REQUESTED TO AVOID THE DANGER AREAS.

lsya:BriefingSection.sectionName: EXTENDED AREA AROUND DESTINATION ALTERNATE AIRPORT(S)

Paragraph.Text: DANGER AREA EPD31 - ACT.

lsya:BriefingSection.sectionName: EXTENDED AREA AROUND DESTINATION ALTERNATE AIRPORT(S)

Paragraph.Text: GNSS JAMMING AND SPOOFING OCCURRENCES HAVE BEEN REPORTED WITHIN FIR EPWW. AIR CREWS TO REMAIN VIGILANT AND TO REPORT TO ATS.

lsya:BriefingSection.sectionName: EXTENDED AREA AROUND DESTINATION ALTERNATE AIRPORT(S)

Paragraph.Text: DUE TO THE CRISIS SITUATION IN UKRAINE, UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE, THE FOLLOWING RAD RESTRICTIONS ARE TEMPORARY SUSPENDED IN EPWW FIR: EP2452, EP2152. THIS TO UNBLOCK ALTERNATIVE CONNECTIONS IN FIR EPWWTO CIRCUMNAVIGATE RESTRICTED AREAS.

lsya:BriefingSection.sectionName: EXTENDED AREA AROUND DESTINATION ALTERNATE AIRPORT(S)

Paragraph.Text: DUE TO THE CRISIS SITUATION IN UKRAINE, UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE, THE FOLLOWING RAD RESTRICTION IS TEMPORARY SUSPENDED IN EPWW FIR: EP2477. THIS TO UNBLOCK ALTERNATIVE CONNECTIONS IN FIR EPWW.

lsya:BriefingSection.sectionName: EXTENDED AREA AROUND DESTINATION ALTERNATE AIRPORT(S)

Paragraph.Text: DUE TO THE CRISIS SITUATION IN UKRAINE, UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE, THE FOLLOWING FLIGHT PLANNING RESTRICTIONS ARE INTRODUCED IN EPWW FIR: 1. ACC WARSZAWA SECTORS: EPWWNL, EPWWNH, EPWWEL, EPWWEH: ARE NOT AVAILABLE FOR TRAFFIC VIA POINTS ENOBI, GORAT, RUDKA, ABERO BTN FL205 AND FL385. THIS TRAFFIC CAN BE PLANNED VIA POINT SOTET

lsya:BriefingSection.sectionName: EXTENDED AREA AROUND DESTINATION ALTERNATE AIRPORT(S)

Paragraph.Text: DUE TO THE CRISIS SITUATION IN UKRAINE AND INCREASED MILITARY ACTIVITY, BASED ON OPERATIONAL SITUATION, AIRSPACE USERS MIGHT EXPECT TACTICAL FLIGHT RESTRICTIONS IN EPWWNL, EPWWNH, EPWWEL, EPWWEH ACC WARSZAWA SECTORS. DEP/ARR EPWA, EPMO VIA SID BAMSO/STAR NEPOX MIGHT BE TACTICALLY RESTRICTED TO MAINTAIN FL LOWER THAN FL225 FOR DISTANCE OF 100NM-140NM AFTER PASSING LAST POINT OF SID OR PRIOR REACHING FIRST POINT OF STAR.

lsya:BriefingSection.sectionName: EXTENDED AREA AROUND DESTINATION ALTERNATE AIRPORT(S)

Paragraph.Text: DUE TO THE CRISIS SITUATION IN UKRAINE AND INCREASED MILITARY ACTIVITY, BASED ON OPERATIONAL SITUATION, AIRSPACE USERS MIGHT EXPECT TACTICAL FLIGHT RESTRICTIONS IN EPWWRL, EPWWRM, EPWWRH ACC WARSZAWA SECTORS. FLIGHTS MIGHT BE TACTICALLY REROUTED VIA EPWWJ SECTOR OR RESTRICTED TO MAINTAIN FL LOWER THAN FL225 OR KEEP FL HIGHER THAN FL315 IN THE WHOLE EPWWR SECTOR AIRSPACE.

lsya:BriefingSection.sectionName: EXTENDED AREA AROUND DESTINATION ALTERNATE AIRPORT(S)

Paragraph.Text: SX0004/24 AIP SUPPLEMENT LKAA/FIR VALIDITY: 13MAY24 - 24MAY24 TEMPORARY RESERVED AREAS FOR INTERNATIONAL MILITARY AIR EXERCISE LION EFFORT 2024 TRA LION 1 FL050/FL305 TRA LION 2 FL195/FL305 TRA LION 3 FL010/FL245 TRA SW1 FL050/FL085 TRA SW2 FL050/FL085 TRA LION1Z PART1 FL050/FL095 TRA LION1Z PART2 FL095/FL305 TRA LION2Z FL195/FL305 TRA LION3Z PART1 FL010/FL095 TRA LION3Z PART2 FL095/FL245 TIME PERIOD OF AREAS: 13-17 20-24 0800-0930: LION 1, LION 2 13-17 20-24 1300-1500: LION 3, SW1, SW2 THE ACTIVATION TIME OF THE FBZ IS IDENTICAL TO THE ACTIVATION TIME OF THE LION 1, LION 2 AND LION 3. FBZ ARE AMC MANAGEABLE. THE DURATION OF THE FBZ ACTIVITIES WILL BE PUBLISHED IN THE AUP/UUP.

lsya:BriefingSection.sectionName: EXTENDED AREA AROUND DESTINATION ALTERNATE AIRPORT(S)

Paragraph.Text: DANGER AREA EPD27 - ACT.
